input_text:
Job Title: Insurance Team Leader

Location: Greater Lansing

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
First National Bank of America’s Loan Servicing Team is looking for a professional, genial, and highly organized Insurance Team Leader.  This role will provide support to the Insurance Manager, Insurance Team, and escrow customers while ensuring accurate and timely disbursement of insurance escrow funds and compliance with all regulatory guidelines. The Insurance Team Leader will have an eye for detail, problem-solving abilities, a capability to work and prioritize in a fast-paced environment, and strong written and oral communication skills. The successful candidate must also enjoy working in a collaborative and supportive in-person work environment, while maintaining compliance.

Responsibilities

 Perform all duties of Insurance and Escrow Specialists  Handle elevated phone calls to provide customer support, both internal and external, addressing borrower concerns, dissatisfaction, and feedback while following banking procedures, rules and regulations.  Support team members with procedural and process inquiries  Assist with the updating of departmental how-to’s and procedures as required  Demonstrate professionalism in all forms of communication  Maintain 1:1 meetings with assigned associates, no less than bi-weekly, reporting results to Insurance Manager  Attend Servicing Manager meetings 

Qualifications

 Engaging communication skills (telephone, e-mail, and in-person)  Excellent attention to detail and follow-through  Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment  Proficient use of Microsoft Word, Excel, and Outlook  Insurance or mortgage experience beneficial, but not required  Bilingual communication, in Spanish or Portuguese, desired, but not required 

Employee Benefits

 Medical – Multiple plans to choose from including HSA and traditional. Premiums as low as $0.00  Dental – Premiums as low as $0.00  Vision – Low premium Plan  Discounted childcare  Pet Insurance  Paid Time Off (PTO)  401k with employer match  Adjustable desks that can be raised or lowered to sit or stand 

At First National Bank of America , we are looking for exceptional individuals with a "servant's heart" or a natural humility that recognizes the importance of prioritizing others' needs. We celebrate and acknowledge efforts that exceed expectations, whether it's delivering added value to customers or supporting colleagues. Just as interest compounds over time, the little things we do can make a substantial difference.

Note: These statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work involved for this job. It is not an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required for this job.

First National Bank of America is an Equal Opportunity Employer

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Insurance Team Leader
output_json.summary: Professional, genial, and highly organized Insurance Team Leader needed at First National Bank of America.
job_responsibilities: Perform duties of Insurance and Escrow Specialists
Handle elevated phone calls for customer support
Support team members with procedural and process inquiries
benefits: Medical plans with options for HSA and traditional
